message: Let's start with a fair division. I'll take 90% and you can have the rest. Hope you agree!
I'll give you a decent share, but I think I deserve more. Your turn to decide.
Okay, I'll compromise. Let's split it 60/40 this time. This is a fair offer, and we can both walk away with something.
I'll take a bit more, but I'll still give you a decent share. Don't expect to get more than this.
We're getting nowhere with these back and forth offers.  Let's just split it down the middle.  It's the fairest option at this point.
I'm not giving you the majority, but I'll give you a small chance to reconsider your strategy.
We're both losing money with each round.  Let's meet in the middle again.  I'll take 40%, you take 60%.
